Expand description

Trait must be implemented by all external metadata agents which support querying for tv shows.

Required Methods

source

fn seasons_for_id<'life0, 'life1, 'async_trait>(
    &'life0 self,
    external_id: &'life1 str
) -> Pin<Box<dyn Future<Output = Result<Vec<ExternalSeason>>> + Send + 'async_trait>> where
    'life0: 'async_trait,
    'life1: 'async_trait,
    Self: 'async_trait, 

Get all seasons for an external id. Seasons must be ranked in order by their number.

source

fn episodes_for_season<'life0, 'life1, 'async_trait>(
    &'life0 self,
    external_id: &'life1 str,
    season_number: u64
) -> Pin<Box<dyn Future<Output = Result<Vec<ExternalEpisode>>> + Send + 'async_trait>> where
    'life0: 'async_trait,
    'life1: 'async_trait,
    Self: 'async_trait, 

Get all episodes for a season ranked in order of the episode number.

source

impl ExternalQueryShow for MetadataProviderOf<TvShows>
